titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to repeal the twenty-fifth amendment to that Constitution.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H64-66)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 1/26/1994--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Repeals the 25th amendment to the Constitution (concerning presidential succession).
